column4: Hi all, Quick question.. I installed screenlets, and when I go to run any internet-based widget I always get an error that says "This screenlet requires Gtkmozembed to run, please install it".. I googled that and I can't seem to find how to install it.. any help would be great, thanks!

Hi all, Quick question.. I installed screenlets, and when I go to run any internet-based widget I always get an error that says "This screenlet requires Gtkmozembed to run, please install it".. I googled that and I can't seem to find how to install it.. any help would be great, thanks!
there's a package for that, hang on...
